text: Kirby's Dream Collection is a 2012 compilation video game for the Wii game console. It was developed and published by Nintendo. It was made to honor the 20th anniversary of the Kirby series. It includes six games in the Kirby series, along with a booklet about the history of Kirby games and a soundtrack. It was released in Japan on July 19, 2012 and in North America on September 16, 2012. It includes the following games: *Kirby's Dream Land *Kirby's Adventure *Kirby's Dream Land 2 *Kirby Super Star *Kirby's Dream Land 3 *Kirby 64: The Crystal Shards The game includes challenge stages based off of those seen in Kirby's Return to Dream Land. It also includes a museum that shows every title in the Kirby series and has three episodes from Kirby: Right Back at Ya!, an anime based off of the Kirby series. title: Kirby's Dream Collection
